title: Is it easy to graduate from high school in 2018? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has always been relatively easy to graduate from high school if you select the right track, or one too easy for you. The trick is to choose a curriculum which is challenging enough for you to use your education to help you progress in life as far as your capabilities will let you go. Finding easy ways to slide by simply taking courses to easy for you will guarantee your learning one important lesson. That is, “My education didn’t help me at all!” That’s a lesson you don’t want to learn. If you’re planning on staying in high school long enough to graduate, it’s time, maybe even past time, to make some preliminary goals for yourself. Do you plan on entering one of the skilled trades? Do you hope to become a professional when you finish school? Is college in your plans? What do you see as the next step in your life after completing high school? Beginning to find workable answers to these questions for yourself is perhaps the most important part of your first year or two in high school. If you plan on attending college, what kind of school do you hope to attend? Luckily, in this question, people are not as locked in to earlier bad decisions as students in other countries. The development of local, low cost community colleges in the U.S. have made re-entry and re-imagining your life easier than it is in other places. You need not attend an elite college, for instance, to become a lawyer or a doctor. But you do need to take school seriously, to consider who you are and where you think you’re going, and to establish work and study skills allowing you to achieve your objectives. School is not a game you play, it’s a way to prepare for life.
